title: How to Make Water Irrigation System

tasks.task: Assembling an irrigation system for a farm.
subtasks: Flatten the land surface using three pallets.
Position large water tank (two tons) and medium tanks (600 liters each).
Install two motors (one for each water tank) and a water softener.
Assemble the main electric water pump (1500 watts) with a filter.
Install PVC pipes and filter components using Teflon tape to prevent leaks.
Drill holes for valves and pipes, using a hole cutter and ensuring proper installation.
Connect tanks to pumps and filters, using PB pipes for durability.
Attach elbows, T joints, and other fittings for water flow regulation.
Install water softener and separators for different water flows (pesticide solution and liquid fertilizer).
Add sub hoses to normalize water pressure and prevent leakage.
Equip tanks with floating valves and water level indicators for monitoring.
Prepare electrical setup including switches, connectors, and floating electric heaters.
Explain safety measures for winter and water waste prevention.
